questions.question_text: "To be COF it requires understanding economy, and technology which is also a weapon used against us." Do you agree? #yes #no #cyberwars
"Americans are tired of Washington corporate interest and Democrats who are interested in politics and power" #yes or #no #birdcorps
"Its a bad deal with Iran - we're not staying with Israel. I think the people are looking for real Leadership." right? #yes #no #birddeal
"A choice between a weak economy and a strong environment is a false one. An energy independent america would be my goal." #yes #no #realGW
"Because of the Obama/Clinton policies, the United States is moving further into a decline." We need to solve it. #yes #no #Obanton
"How can we beat an enemy if our CIC can't say that islam has a problem and that is radical islam." Right? #yes #no #heNeedsToSayIt
"Sometimes you win a war by killing murderous evil terrorists." #yes #no #SendInTheEagles
"If you don't understand that we need more ground forces in Iraq, then you're not ready to be commander in chief." #yes #no #MoreEagles
"If we don't stop them over there, then they're coming over here." #yes #no #VulturesAreIncoming
"A simple strategy against ISIL - Whatever it takes, as long as it takes, to defeat them." #yes #no #PigeonPoopThem
"I would not place one american life at risk, but to destroy ISIS, it is absolutely necessary." #yes #no #LeavingTheNest
"We need to tear down cyber walls, not on a mass basis but on a targeted basis." Shouldn't we? #yes #no #NoPrivacyForCrows
"There is more collaboration required between private sector companies and the public sector." Right? #yes #no #EagleIntervention
"I would call on Apple and Google to cooperate let the FBI know where they need to go." Right idea? #yes #no #CloudHunt
"We have to put the personel on that border in the right places, you have to put the strategic fencing in place." #yes or #no
"Until you change the policies of Barack Obama, we're never going to change this economy." #yes or #no #Outbama
"If I have to monitor a mosque, I'll monitor a mosque." #yes #no #PrivacyIsExclusive
"Take the rest of the Federal entitlements - food stamps, medicade, etc and add work requirements and time limits" #yes or #no #entitled
"Obamacare is a drag on the economy, I propose to reverse that and get this economy moving again." Who's with me? #yes #no #ObamaDontCare
"Simply expanding medicade does not improve healthcare outcome. We have to stop this culture of government dependency" #yes or #no #birdCare
"We need to be on the side that keeps iran from getting a nuclear weapon, and that's the side of the bulk of the ME" #yes #no #poopNuke
"The issue for us is to have a congress that says hell no to this money going to a regime that uses it for terrorists" #yes or #no #PoopFund
"Day 1 in the oval office, I'll call Bibi Netenyahu to reassure him that we will stand with the good state of Israel" #yes #no #BibiLove
"When america does not lead, the world is a dangerous and a tragic place" #yes #no #LeadNotRead
"We have Arab allies, they need to see leadership and resolve from the USA and we can help them defeat ISIS" #yes or #no #DefeatISIS
"Gay Marriage is a rogue suppreme court decision" We should not allow it. #yes or #no #RoosterAndChick
"We should be appointing supreme court justices who will follow the law and not try to make the law" #yes or #no #RoosterandRooster
"I've always been appalled by abortion, I beleive life begins at conception" #yes or #no #DontEatEggs
"Put a permanent ban on any tax payer money used to support abortion" #yes or #no #DontBuyEggs
"Absolutely we need to defund Planned Parenthood" #yes or #no #PlannedBirdhood
"I don't think its a war on women for us to stand up and stop harvesting organs from unborn babies" #yes or #no #UnbordBirdies
"The president should not be legistlating, we should be relying upon the leadership of congress to pass the laws" #yes or #no #EagleCongress
"That Iran negotiation is going to be torn up on day one in office" Agree that it should? #yes or #no #EaglesDontFlyIran
"We need to begin by undoing a whole set of things that President Obama has done" #yes or #no #Undobama
"Hilary Clinton is not the change we need in a time we need change" True? #yes or #no #NotTheBirdWeNeed
"Folks that come here they have to come here legally, they need to learn english, adopt our values" #yes or #no #AllBirdsShouldSpeakEagle
"The last thing the country needs is another Bush in the Oval Office" Am I right? #yes or #no #NoMoreBushtits
"I think the big problem this country has is being politically correct" #yes or #no #PoliticallyCorrect
"We don't win anymore. We lose to China. We lose to Mexico both in trade and at the border." #yes or #no #LosingToMandarineDucks
"I'm pro-life, and I think this is consistent with many Americans out there" Do you agree? #yes or #no #BalutsAreAlive
"ISIS rides around in a billion dollars worth of U.S. Humvees. It's a disgrace." #yes or #no #EagleHoneyBee
"It costs $22,500 a year to keep them in prison. I'd rather get them medication so they lead a decent life." #yes or #no #BackToTheNest
"Illegal Immigrants broke the law, but it's not a felony, it's an act of love and commitment to your family." #yes or #no #WelcomeAllBirds
"We need to build a wall, and it has to be built quickly" #yes or #no #BirdFence
"They send the bad ones over because they don't want to pay for them. They don't want to take care of them." True? #yes or #no #FlyBack
"Here is the thing about Donald Trump. Donald Trump is hitting a nerve in this country" #yes or #no #TrumpTheEagle
"I also believe we need a fence. If El Chapo builds a tunnel under the fence, we have to be able to deal with that too." #yes or #no #Rats
"We will not defeat radical Islamic terrorism so long as we have a president unwilling to utter those words" #yes or #no #TweetTheWords
"when we invaded, it was a mistake" #yes or #no #IraqiPrey
"If we gave our generals the mission, which is what the CIC does, they would be able to carry it out" #yes or #no #stopISISbyForce
"The insurance companies are making a fortune because they have control of the politicians" Don't they? #yes or #no #InfiniteBirdSeeds
"We have a Wall Street-to-Washington access of power that has controlled the political climate." #yes or #no #HomingPigeons
"I'm still one who says that we can get rid of the Internal Revenue Service if we would pass the fair tax" #yes or #no #OutIRS
"The creation of curriculum or content is clearly a state responsibility." Clearly. #yes or #no #NotMyResponsibility
"You know, America is a miracle country." #yes or #no #AllBirdsCanFlyHigh
"Hilary is the epitome of the progressive - the secular progressive movement" And we don't want that. #yes or #no #FlyAway
"You get rid of Obamacare and replace it with something that doesn't suppress wages and kill jobs" #yes or #no #HuntDownObamacare
"We're for the X.L. pipeline. We should be for these things to create high sustained economic growth." Agree? #yes or #no #PipeforGrowth
"if person goes to 65, they spend 51 years with the government reaching into their pocket at every paycheck." #yes or #no #GovInPocket
"Why don't we let Congress start by changing their retirement program, and not have one" #yes or #no #OldBirdsAreYoungBirds
"This country right now owes $19 trillion. And they need somebody like me to straighten out that mess." #yes or #no #BusinessBird
"We need to even out the tax code for all businesses so that we lower their tax rate to 25 percent" #yes or #no #LowerTheRate
"Put even more crippling sanctions in place, and then you convince our allies to do the same." #yes or #no #iranDealOrNoDeal
"President Obama gave away too much, too early." #yes or #no #GaveAllSeeds
"Ronald Reagan said - trust, but verify. President Obama is - trust, but vilify." #yes or #no #thanksObama
"We said that we would make sure that they didn't have any nuclear capacity, we gave that up" That's not okay. #yes or #no #NuclearTweethead
"We should pass law that human life at every stage of its development is worthy of protection" #yes or #no #EggLifeIsBirdLife
"Generations will look back at this history and call us barbarians for murdering millions of babies" #yes or #no #HatchlingMurderers
"We're not going on win by doing what Obama and Clinton do each and every day. Dividing the country." #yes or #no #UnitedWeTweet
"Look, I don't want my marriage or my guns registered in Washington." Agree? #yes or #no #FlyAnywhereGunAnywhere
"When the government tries to invade the church to enforce its own opinion on marriage, it's time to resist." #yes or #no #ResistTemptations
"Stand up and support those men and women who are doing their jobs in law enforcement" #yes or #no #EaglePolice
"It's about training." That's how we solve aggressive policing. #yes or #no #CrowsCanBeTrained
"If Iran was a stock, you folks should go out and buy it right now because you'll quadruple" #yes or #no #SoaringIran
"We have abandoned and alienated our friends and allies, and our enemies are stronger." #yes or #no #FlyTogether #FlyAway
"It is worth emphasizing that Iran released our hostages the day Ronald Reagan was sworn into office." Use force. #yes or #no #PeckerReagan
"The Russians and Chinese know more about Hillary's email server than do the members of US Congress" #yes or #no #HomingHilary
"I would put in place back in the missile defense system that we had in Poland and in Czech Republic." Shouldn't we? #yes #no #AirDefense
"I'm not sure how paying for transgender surgery for soldiers, sailors, airmen makes our country safer." #yes or #no #OnlyEaglesTakeWing
"We ought to quit sending money to countries that burn our flag. Israel is not one of those." #yes or #no #AlightAtIsrael
"We shouldn't borrow money from China to send it anywhere, why don't we start with eliminating aid to our enemies" #yes or #no #CawAtEnemies
"Israel is a priority to be able to fund and keep them strong and safe after eight years of this administration" #yes or #no #BroodIsrael
"Move the U.S. embassy in Israel to Jerusalem" #yes or #no #RoostInJerusalem
"Our country is in serious trouble. We don't win anymore." #yes or #no #ChirpToWin
"Free Fajitas for all" - Do you agree with Hillary? #yes #no why?
"We must invest in our country and the potential of our kids to make college a debt free option for all families" #yes #no #FreeCollege
"The middle class of this country for the last 40 years has been disappearing" We must solve that. #yes #no #BringBackMiddleClass
"Climate change is real, it is caused by human activity" #yes #no #BirdEggsAreBoiling
"Instead of building jails and providing incarceration, we should educate and provide jobs for our kids" #yes or #no #MoreNestsLessCages
"Take back government from a handful of billionaires, create a vibrant democracy we know we can and should have" #yes or #no #RichinPigeon
"At the center of my campaign is how we're going to raise wages" As it should be. #yes or #no #RaiseTheWage
"Right now, the wealthy pay too little and the middle class pays too much" #yes or #no #DrTooLittle
"I believe in equal pay for women, I also believe it's about time we had paid family leave for American families" #yes #no #PaidBrooding
"There's too much inequality - racial divides, discrimination against the LGBT community" We need solutions #yes or #no #AllBirdsAreEqual
"It is immoral and wrong that the top one-tenth of 1% in this country own as much wealth as the bottom 90 percent" #yes #no #WealthStreet
"Every major country provides health care to all people as a right, except the USA" We should do the same. #yes or #no for #BirdCare
"I am not part of the casino capitalist process by which so few have so much and so many have so little" With me? #yes or #no #DemSocialism
"I believe in a society where all people do well. Not just a handful of billionaires." Do you too? #yes or #no #Birdionaires
"It's our job to rein in the excesses of capitalism so that it doesn't run amok" Agree? #yes or #no #FlutteringCapitalism
"We would be making a mistake to turn our backs on what built the greatest middle class in the history" Correct? #yes or #no #SingCapitalism
"We have to make sure that every family in this country gets a fair shake" Do you agree? #yes or #no #FairShakeItOff
"I have strongly supported instant background checks, doing away with this terrible gun show loophole" Right? #yes or #no #HuntNoBird
"There are thousands who are suicidal, homicidal, but can't get the healthcare that they need" We need to help. #yes or #no #BirdCare
"It's time the entire country stood up against the NRA" We need proper gun control. #yes or #no #BirdsGetShot
"We have to stand up to Putin's bullying, and specifically in Syria, it is important" #yes or #no #CawingPutin
"We should be supportive, but I do not support American ground troops in Syria" #yes or #no #NoEaglesInSyria
"We failed to invest in the human intelligence that allows us to make better decisions in Libya and Syria" #yes or #no #BirdIntelligence
"I happen to believe that war should be the last resort that we have got to exercise diplomacy" #yes or #no #LastResort
"The greatest security threat is the chaos in the Middle East, and it all started with the Iraq invasion" #yes or #no #IraqFlutter
"Climate change, of course, is one of our biggest threats" #yes or #no #AlwaysSunnyChristmas
"The planet that we're leaving our kids and our grandchildren may not be habitable. That is a major crisis" #yes or #no #InhabitableHome
"The people want to know whether we're going to have a democracy or an oligarchy as a result of Citizens Union" #yes or #no #WhosUnion
"We need to make American 100 percent clean electric by 2050" #yes or #no #clearSkies
"Black lives matter" #yes or #no #BlackLivesMatter or #AllLivesMatter
"We need to combat institutional racism from top to bottom, we need major reforms in a broken justice system" #yes or #no #ReformJustice
"Raise the minimum wage to $15 an hour; pay equity for women workers" Should we? #yes or #no #EqualPay #ProperPay
"The economy does better when you have a Democrat in the White House" Right? #yes #no #DemocratInTheHouse
"The greed, recklessness, and illegal behavior of Wall Street, destroyed this economy and the lives of millions" #yes or #no #StopWallStreet
"I want Wall Street to help kids go to colleges and universities, free with a Wall Street speculation tax" With me? #yes or #no #FreeCollege
"Donald Trump and his billionaire friends under my policies are going to pay a lot more in taxes" With me? #yes or #no #TakeTrumpDown
"I want to enhance the benefits for the poorest recipients of Social Security" As we should. #yes or #no #SSForThePoor
"When you have 11 million undocumented people in this country, we need comprehensive immigration reform" #yes or #no #MigrationReform
"We always have to keep the balance of civil liberties, privacy and security" #yes or #no #AllAboutTheBalance
"I'd shut down what exists right now, that virtually every telephone call in this country ends up in a file at the NSA" #yes or #no
"I don't think Snowden should be brought home without facing the music" #yes or #no #HoneInOnSnowden
"I think what Snowden did in educating us should be taken into consideration" #yes or #no #ProfessorSnowden
"I think being the first woman president would be quite a change from the presidents we've had up until this point" #yes or #no #FemaleEagle
"I think being the first woman president would be quite a change from the presidents we've had up until this point" #yes or #no #FemaleEagle
"We need to have one of the larger voter turnouts in the world, not one of the lowest" #yes or #no #FlockBirdsFlock
"That is an international embarrassment that we do not provide paid family and medical leave" We should. #yes or #no #PaidLeave
"We would be a stronger nation economically if we had paid family leave" #yes or #no #PaidLeaveMakesUsStronger
"I am seeing in this country too many lives being destroyed for non-violent offenses" Legalize marijuana. #yes or #no #Dude
"I would vote yes for legalizing marijuana" Agree? #yes or #no #AlreadySmoking
"We should not be the only major country on Earth that does not guarantee health care to all of our people" #yes or #no #CareForAll
